name: Cinemapocalypses
description:
Three popular movies mixed with each other. 

Travel between movie scenes, find inconsistencies and return items and characters to their places

Game was made for local game jam

Authors:
Ruslan Khakimov -  programming, gamedesign
Ilshat Safiullin - programming
Aibulat Kinyabayev - modeling, art
Marat Taturas - sound direction
